p: Using PCS, the obtained Z-average of the oil droplet size was approximately 250 nm and the index of polydispersity was very narrow (0.160), thereby indicating that all samples were exceptionally monodisperse (Tables 5 and 6). The size of oily droplets was in the same range ( P < .05), regardless of the storage time with furosemide or torasemide with the TPN admixture (Fig. 1).
